name: 2.5D College Prototype/Mockup
description: This is a very early prototype of a 2.5D platformer college UE4 project, it's mainly a test for a health and damage system with flipbook animation for the character movements. We were tasked in getting these elements working into a project with the theme being our choice, I think at the time I was going for a dreamscape type of feel with that reflecting on the characters somewhat.
